short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces about 100 common English words with equivalent German words across all websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just A Little German translates about 100 of the most commonly used English words with their German equivalent across all websites. Learn German vocabulary on sites you visit everyday such as Facebook and Twitter by substituting just a little English, for just a little German today.
